topic: Ange Postecoglou's tumultuous initial weeks as Nottingham Forest manager.
evaluation: This cluster provides a strong, time-continuous narrative detailing Ange Postecoglou's arrival at Nottingham Forest, starting with Nuno Espirito Santo's departure and Postecoglou's subsequent appointment. It then tracks his initial games across various competitions (Premier League, Carabao Cup, Europa League), highlighting the club's struggles and the increasing pressure on the new manager, culminating in significant fan backlash. The articles are highly relevant, developmental, and paint a clear picture of a manager's turbulent start. Article 'football/live/2025/sep/13/premier-league-returns-with-postecoglou-taking-nottingham-forest-to-arsenal-matchday-live' was de-noised as it is a generic live blog and does not provide specific, reportable content for synthesis into the main narrative.
